mapper.select: SELECT BETSEQ ,MAX(BETDATE) AS BETDATE ,AVG(BETCASH) AS BETCASH ,CASE AVG(BETRESULT) WHEN 1 THEN '적중' WHEN 0 THEN '실패' ELSE '대기중' END "BETRESULTSTRING" FROM BET_HISTORY WHERE USERID = #{userId} GROUP BY BETSEQ

SELECT T1.GAMESEQ, T1.USERID, T1.BETSEQ, T2.GAMEHOME, T2.GAMEAWAY, T2.GAMEHP, T2.GAMEDP, T2.GAMEAP, T1.BETCHOICE, T1.GAMERESULT FROM BET_HISTORY T1, CROSS T2 WHERE T1.GAMESEQ = T2.GAMESEQ AND USERID=#{userId} AND BETSEQ=#{betSeq}
SELECT GAMESEQ, USERID, BETSEQ, BETCHOICE, BETDATE, BETP, BETCASH FROM BET_HISTORY WHERE USERID=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BET_HISTORY ( GAMESEQ, USERID, BETSEQ, BETCHOICE, BETDATE, BETP, BETCASH ) VALUES ( #{gameSeq}, #{userId}, #{betSeq}, #{betChoice}, SYSDATE, #{betP}, #{betCash} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BET_HISTORY SET GAMERESULT = (SELECT GAMERESULT FROM CROSS WHERE GAMESEQ = #{gameSeq}) WHERE GAMESEQ = #{gameSeq}
